```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
exams<-read_excel("Exam Grades.xlsx")[1:18,]
slack<-read_excel("Slack Participation.xlsx")[1:18,]
homework <- read_csv("Homework.csv")[1:18,]
```

```{r}
gradebook <- inner_join(exams,slack, by = c("reed_id", "first_name", "last_name")) %>% inner_join(homework, by = c("reed_id", "first_name", "last_name")) %>% select(reed_id, first_name, last_name, Midterm_1_pct, Total, hw_pct)
```

```{r}
gradebook <- gradebook %>% rowwise() %>% mutate(participation = min(Total, 11)/11)
```

```{r}
weight_names <-c("homework", "midterm", "participation") 
weights  <- c(.5, .4, .1)
```

```{r}
gradebook <- gradebook %>% mutate(score = hw_pct*weights[1] + Midterm_1_pct*weights[2]+ participation*weights[3])
```
